A magical transformation potion that turns the starfish into a humanoid creature with the ability to walk on land.
A device that allows the starfish to control the tides and waves, allowing it to create a path to the shore.
A technology that allows the starfish to communicate with humans, providing insights into its thoughts and feelings.
A robot that is designed to mimic the movements of a starfish, allowing it to navigate through the ocean and onto the shore.
A magical spell that allows the starfish to levitate and fly onto the shore, bypassing any obstacles in its way.
